content: TITLE: Implementing LinkedIn Authentication DESCRIPTION: Example of implementing LinkedIn authentication flow using the facade. SOURCE: https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` if (LinkedIn::isAuthenticated()) { //we know that the user is authenticated now. Start query the API $user=LinkedIn::get('v1/people/~:(firstName,lastName)'); echo "Welcome ".$user['firstName']; exit(); }elseif (LinkedIn::hasError()) { echo "User canceled the login."; exit(); } //if not authenticated $url = LinkedIn::getLoginUrl(); echo "Login with LinkedIn"; exit(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Laravel LinkedIn Package DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Laravel LinkedIn package using Composer package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require artesaos/laravel-linkedin ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Posting to LinkedIn Wall (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of posting content to LinkedIn wall using JSON format. SOURCE: https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` LinkedIn::setAccessToken('access_token_from_db'); $options = ['json'=> [ 'comment' => 'Im testing Happyr LinkedIn client with Laravel Framework! https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin', 'visibility' => [ 'code' => 'anyone' ] ] ]; $result = LinkedIn::post('v1/people/~/shares', $options); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Posting to LinkedIn Wall (XML) DESCRIPTION: Example of posting content to LinkedIn wall using XML format. SOURCE: https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` $options = array( 'format' => 'xml', 'body' => ' Im testing Happyr LinkedIn client! https://github.com/Happyr/LinkedIn-API-client anyone '); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Laravel Service Provider DESCRIPTION: Registration of the LinkedIn service provider in Laravel configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` Artesaos\LinkedIn\LinkedinServiceProvider::class, ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Registering Laravel Facade DESCRIPTION: Registration of the LinkedIn facade for easy access to LinkedIn functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` 'LinkedIn' => \Artesaos\LinkedIn\Facades\LinkedIn::class, ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Lumen Integration DESCRIPTION: Setup for LinkedIn integration in Lumen framework including service provider, facade and configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/artesaos/laravel-linkedin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` $app->register(\Artesaos\LinkedIn\LinkedinServiceProvider::class); class_alias(\Artesaos\LinkedIn\Facades\LinkedIn::class,'LinkedIn'); $app->configure('linkedin'); ```
